title: Tiny suitcase for Tiny Desk
content:
Back in May I drove across town to Verdugo to hang with my friend Ian who was visiting from Paris. I was standing around talking to some people and out of the corner of my eye I see Mark Nishita (a.k.a. Money Mark), who I’ve known since the Topspin Days, but was obviously familiar with his work many years before. He had just been dropped off and had a small roller suitcase with him. I asked him why he brought a suitcase to the bar and he proceeded to explain that he came straight from a flight from Washington DC where he had just recorded a Tiny Desk concert with Cypress Hill.

If you haven’t seen it yet, I highly recommend it.
author: bradbarrish
